SEARCH
Package gridgames

Class Tile

java.lang.Object
gridgames.Tile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable
public final class Tile extends Object implements Serializable, Cloneable
Class which describes the element the user can interact with to play the game. This elements is called a tile, as it is very often a piece of grid in most 2D-syle puzzle games.

A Tile object is represented by a value and can be indirectly selected or unselected by the user during the game.

See Also:
